Package org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnnounceListener  
    ApplicationFrameworkMessageConsumer  
    ApplicationFrameworkMessageListener
    This class reppresent the callback invoked by the ZigBeeNetworkManager whenever a message
    that belongs to the Application Framework arrives from the ZigBee Network
    ApplicationFrameworkMessageProducer  
    AsynchronousCommandListener  
    ClusterFilter
    This class represent the filter used by the ZigBeeEndpoint to identifies
    if the ClusterListener has to handle or not the ClusterMessage.
    In fact, the ClusterListener.handleCluster(ZigBeeEndpoint, ClusterMessage) must be invoked
    if and only if either
    - the ClusterFilter returned by ClusterListener.getClusterFilter() is null, or
    - the ClusterFilter.match(ClusterMessage) on the cluster return true
    ClusterListener  
    ClusterMessage  
    Constants  
    EndpointListener
    Provides an interface to notify upper layers of changes to endpoints.
    NodeListener
    Provides an interface to notify upper layers of changes to nodes.
    SynchronousCommandListener  
    ZigBeeDiscoveryMonitor  
    ZigBeeEndpoint
    This interface represent a ZigBee Endpoint.
    ZigBeeNetworkManager  
    ZigBeeNode
    This class represent a ZigBee node, it means a physical device that can communicate using the ZigBee protocol.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ZigBeeNodeComplexDescriptor  
    ZigBeeNodeDescriptor
    This implements the Node Descriptor.
    ZigBeeNodePowerDescriptor
    This implements the Node Power Descriptor.
    ZigBeeNodeUserDescriptor  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ZigBeeNodeDescriptor.LOGICAL_TYPE
    The logical type field of the node descriptor is three bits in length and specifies the device type of the ZigBee node.
    ZigBeeNodeDescriptor.MAC_CAPABILITY
    The MAC capability flags field is eight bits in length and specifies the node capabilities, as required by the IEEE 802.15.4-2003 MAC sub-layer
    ZigBeeNodeDescriptor.SERVER_MASK
    The server mask field of the node descriptor is sixteen bits in length, with bit settings signifying the system server capabilities of this node.
    ZigBeeNodePowerDescriptor.POWER_LEVEL
    The current power source level field of the node power descriptor is four bits in length and specifies the level of charge of the power source.
    ZigBeeNodePowerDescriptor.POWER_MODE
    The current power mode field of the node power descriptor is four bits in length and specifies the current sleep/power-saving mode of the node.
    ZigBeeNodePowerDescriptor.POWER_SOURCE
    The power sources fields of the node power descriptor are four bits in length and specifies the power sources available on this node.
